page.title: 15Daily Life
page.content: My name is Ziek Hardwick, I am 12 years old. I have two brothers, Joel aged seven and Luke aged three. My mum is a barmaid at Batley Sports Centre. My dad is a postman. He gets up at 3.30 a.m. every morning except Sundays. He finishes work at about 12 noon. On Monday morning when I get up I put on my school uniform, I go downstairs light the fire and have my breakfast. Then Luke and Joel get up, we have an argument, Joel starts crying and tells mum, and we all have a mass argument. This stops at 8.20 a.m. when I go out. School finishes at 3.35 p.m. After an action packed day I get home and we're all friends again. Then I do my homework and have my tea. After that I go out for a game of football or American football. I take my brothers to bed and then watch T.V.
